title: FS: T206 - SGC graded commons - Piedmont & Sweet Caporal backs - ALL SOLD
author: willworkforT206

posts.post_title: FS: T206 - SGC graded commons - Piedmont & Sweet Caporal backs - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Selling some of my T206 doubles. I have the following available:
 
Bill Bradley (With Bat), Piedmont 350, SGC 50/4, no creases, nice centering, $45  SOLD
Rube Manning (Batting), Sweet Caporal 150/649 Overprint, SGC 40/3, crease lower right, $40 SOLD
Fred Payne, Piedmont 350-460/25, SGC 60/5, nice color, $85 now $75 SOLD
Ed Karger, Sweet Caporal 150/30, SGC 50/4, tougher subject, nice color and gloss on back, $55 SOLD
Harry Krause (Pitching), Piedmont 350, SGC 50/4, dark blemish on front at top, $40 now $35 SOLD
Jim Scott, Piedmont 350, SGC 50/4, nice color and centering, small area of discoloration on back, $45 SOLD
Doc White (Pitching), Sweet Caporal 350/30, SGC 50/4, nice color and centering, $45 now $40 SOLD
 
Prices include shipping. Add $2.00 for insurance (at buyer’s option).
 
E-mails committing to purchase take priority over posts. Please e-mail me at [URL="sschris@att.net"]sschris@att.net[/URL] if interested. 
 
Paypal is my preferred method of payment, but other arrangements can be made.
 
PLEASE BE PATIENT WITH E-MAIL RESPONSES/CORRESPONDENCE. I HAVE LIMITED ACCESS TO E-MAIL DURING THE DAYTIME. I WILL REPLY TO ALL E-MAILS. THANKS.
 
Thanks for looking.
 
Steve

posts.post_title: FS: T206 - SGC graded commons - Piedmont & Swee
posts.post_content:
Bump for price reductions (see above).  Also inviting trade offers for raw or graded T206s I don't have.

Thanks for looking.

Steve

Will take the three cards that you have left if still available.

Thanks,

Joe

Hi Steve,

Received the cards this afternoon. Very happy.

Best regards,

Joe
